summary: Seasoned estimator in civil and infrastructure projects with 15+ years of expertise, managing projects across hospitals to roadways, achieving up to $24M in contract values.

bullets.text: Oversee the comprehensive analysis of tendering documents to ensure accurate project cost projections. Implemented first principle estimating processes, achieving a 95% accuracy rate in BOQs and final project accounts.
Developed detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) for diverse construction projects including residential, commercial, and infrastructure, managing contracts exceeding $5M per project on average.
Led cost estimating efforts for major design variations, mitigating budget overages by implementing strategic cost-saving measures, resulting in a 20% reduction in projected expenses.

Conducted rigorous quantity take-offs across civil project components, including complex installations like MEP and specialized infrastructure, promoting project efficiency and reducing material waste by 15%.
Engaged in cost consulting and negotiations with suppliers, optimizing contract values with a 10% cost reduction on bulk material orders.
Drafted and presented comprehensive commercial offers, enhancing project win rate by 22% through competitive yet cost-effective proposals.
Successfully managed projects worth over $6M for religious and educational institutions, driving efficient project execution in line with budgetary constraints.
Performed extensive tender analysis, improving scope accuracy, and enhancing preliminary budgeting precision, with contributions leading to multiple awarded projects exceeding $10M AUD.
Developed and implemented innovative BOQ systems for infrastructure projects that aligned material, labor, and equipment estimates with project demands, achieving a 98% alignment rate.
Enhanced project submissions and cost consulting processes, leading to a 15% quicker approval time from stakeholders through clarified assumptions and detailed documentation.
Orchestrated cost assessments for design changes, maintaining project health and budget compliance through thorough analysis and effective supplier negotiations.
Led the preparation of various infrastructure project accounts, ensuring accurate financial tracking against project milestones, reducing fiscal variances by 29%.
Initiated project schedules that provided robust timelines, reducing overlooked milestones by 35% across critical infrastructure projects.
Proposed and implemented construction method changes, proving instrumental in reducing project costs by leveraging contemporary engineering techniques.
Directed comprehensive tender document analysis, facilitating efficient site team coordination and project scope communication, leading to increased bid success for key projects.
Prepared detailed BOQs and commercial proposals for large-scale developments, including high-value municipal contracts valued at over $60M.
Managed design and cost alignment processes, utilizing cost consulting strategies to achieve a 17% decrease in projected overruns.
Conducted comprehensive feasibility studies for land acquisition and highrise residential buildings, ensuring financial feasibility and securing project financing.
Prepared thorough BOQs and cost estimates for complex residential developments, accurately accounting for design variations and maintaining budgetary limits.
Conducted feasibility cost studies for logistic warehouses, accurately estimating project scope and delivering designs aligned with financial constraints.
Managed on-site quantity take-off and cost assessment for hospital projects, ensuring construction alignment with financial goals and reducing additional costs by 18%.
Facilitated cross-team communication in tendering processes, resulting in enhanced project win rates through thorough technical proposals and methodological illustrations.
